meta.title: My Crypto Heroes | Beta Battle test
meta.description: ‘My Crypto Heroes’(MCH) is Beta Battle test now. Heroes acquired through the Pre-sale can be used. You can get some prize! Beta tests will be carried out for each function sequentially.

body.title: Choosing team members
body.body:
Assemble a team using your heroes.
You can include up to 3 heroes in your team.

body.title: Choosing Extensions (Equipment)
body.body:
Heroes can wear up to 2 extensions.
Heroes are strengthened when wearing equipment.

body.title: Rearrange Active Skills
body.body:
Heroes act using Active Skills during their turns. Active Skills are automatically used in top-down order.
Rearrange their order according to your battle plan.

body.title: Choosing opponents
body.body:
Ranks are an indication of the opponent's strength.
The higher the enemy's rank, the greater the potential rewards!

body.title: Battle!
body.body:
Battles are autonomously fought by your team.
Cheer on your heroes and watch over the battle progression!

notice: The heroes and extensions provided are for Battle β Test only.
Heroes purchased in the pre-sale may be used in Battle β Test, however their status and skills will differ after the game is in service.
Rental heroes and extensions will be withdrawn after Battle β Test ends.
Data from Battle β Test will not be carried over after the game's release.

warning.title: Art edit rules and notes on beta battle
list: Images can be changed any number of times
The initial image is retained without being lost after art editing. You can undo by "Unset"
For edited images, only the display in MCH is changed. On external services such as opensea, the initial image is displayed even after editing.
Do not use pictures that infringe copyright or images that are against public order and morality.
Images uploaded with Art Edit System are managed decentralizedly using IPFS which is a distributed file system.
In addition, please refer to Article 11 of the following Terms of Service for the attention of Art Usage Terms of Use.
warning.footer: * The above rules may be changed after beta battle.
